remarks: Exchange the outer point of two betweenness statements.  Right-hand side of Theorem 3.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tkgeom.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tkgeom.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tkgeom.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tkgeom.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnintr.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnintr.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnintr.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwnintr.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgbtwnexch2.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnexch2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( B I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnexch2 $p |- ( ph -> C e. ( A I D ) ) $.
